<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107871</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107871</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205510</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">ESL: English Adjectives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ESL: Englische Adjektive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ESL : Adjectifs Anglais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ESL: Adjetivos Ingleses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ESL: Aggettivi Inglesi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ESL: Αγγλικά επίθετα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ESL: Adjetivos Ingleses</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Learners of English as a second or foreign language can test their knowledge of adjectives using 36 pictures.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger von Englisch als zweites oder von 
Fremdsprache können ihr Wissen von Adjektiven mit 6 Abbildungen 
prüfen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants de l'anglais en tant que deuxième 
ou de la langue étrangère peuvent tester leur connaissance des 
adjectifs en utilisant 36 images.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners do inglês como um segundo ou da 
língua extrangeira podem testar seu conhecimento dos adjetivos usando
36 retratos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti dell'inglese come un secondo o 
della lingua straniera possono verificare la loro conoscenza degli 
aggettivi usando 36 immagini.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αρχάριοι των αγγλικών ως δεύτερη ή ξένη γλώσσα 
μπορούν να εξετάσουν τη γνώση επιθέτων τους χρησιμοποιώντας 36
εικόνες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los principiantes del inglés como segundo o del 
idioma extranjero pueden probar su conocimiento de adjetivos usando 36
cuadros.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:ALAN ESTES
FN:ALAN ESTES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205510</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107871</entry>
    </identifier>
